```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(rerddapXtracto)
```

```{r}
require("rerddap")


#SST for each Buoy
E_sst <- griddap('erdMWsstd1day_LonPM180', #Need to determine approp grid for each buoy
 time = c('last','last'),
 latitude = c(31.75, 35.0),
 longitude = c(-121.5, -116.5),
 fmt = "csv")

W_sst <- griddap('erdMWsstd1day_LonPM180', #Need to determine approp grid for each buoy
 time = c('last','last'),
 latitude = c(31.75, 35.0),
 longitude = c(-121.5, -116.5),
 fmt = "csv")

SM_sst <- griddap('erdMWsstd1day_LonPM180', #Need to determine approp grid for each buoy
 time = c('last','last'),
 latitude = c(31.75, 35.0),
 longitude = c(-121.5, -116.5),
 fmt = "csv")


#Chloro for each Buoy
E_chloro <- griddap('erdMWchla1day_LonPM180', #Need to determine approp grid for each buoy
  time = c('last','last'),
  latitude = c(31.75, 35.0),
  longitude = c(-121.5, -116.5),
  fmt = "csv")

W_chloro <- griddap('erdMWchla1day_LonPM180', #Need to determine approp grid for each buoy
  time = c('last','last'),
  latitude = c(31.75, 35.0),
  longitude = c(-121.5, -116.5),
  fmt = "csv")

SM_chloro <- griddap('erdMWchla1day_LonPM180', #Need to determine approp grid for each buoy
  time = c('last','last'),
  latitude = c(31.75, 35.0),
  longitude = c(-121.5, -116.5),
  fmt = "csv")
```
